item.title: How to Use the Circle Tool in Inkscape
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Insert a Circle: With Mouse With Keyboard How to Resize a Circle How to Edit the Circle Shape No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Insert a Circle With Mouse Step 1: First click the Circle tool. Step 2: Click and drag the mouse on the canvas to create a circle. How to Insert a Circle With Keyboard Step 1: On the keyboard press E.
